name: Merrenoloth
resistance: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The merrenoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: charm person, darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, gust of wind * 3/day: control water * 1/day: control weather

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The merrenoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Teleport
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
